job_title: IS&T SAP Project Manager, Early Career
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBachelor's degree or higher in a business or technology (STEAM - Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) related field of study.
• Prior internship experience.
• Exposure to project management and/or enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems such as SAP, demonstrating strong organizational and collaboration skills (gained through training, internships, or academic projects).
